    Plotting Heliothermal Index

    clima_dMI()

    Climate Diagram (Absolute)

    clima_diagramm_change()

    clima_plot_cornors()

    Plot climate data used to run the Monica models.

    ens_12maps()

    Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files

    ens_12maps_relative_change()

    Plotting 12 maps (3 historical + 9 relative change) from 3 RCP scenarios

    ens_all_mems_heatmap()

    Plotting heatmaps of the three RCPs scenarios plus five ensembles

    ens_boxplots()

    Plotting boxplots from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files

    ens_density_3RCPs_4Periods()

    Plotting Density of three RCPs scenarios for four different periods

    ens_linear_trend()

    Plotting linear trend from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files

    ens_public_output()

    Plotting one informative plot containing, relative change maps, box plots and time series.

    ens_spatial_trend()

    Plotting three maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files

    ens_yearly_boxplots()

    Plotting boxplot time series of the three RCPs scenarios

    ens_yearly_ridges()

    Plotting ridges of the three RCPs scenarios for each decade

    exp_boxplots()

    Plotting boxplots from experiment files

    exp_linear_trend()

    Plotting linear trend from experiment files

    Corine Land Cover

    land_cover_legend

    Corine Land Cover -Metadata-legend

    make_ensemble_from_sims()

    Making an ensemble from individual simulations (i.e. individual simulation as netCDf files)

    palette_wiki_schwarzwald_cont

    Colors for DEM plotting

    round_custom()

    A function to receive a number and round up or down according to the next number indicated by roundTo

    sim_PDF()

    Plotting PDF from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods.

    sim_boxplots()

    Plotting boxplots from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods.

    sim_linear_trend()

    Plotting linear trend from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3.
